divs: Sighting DetailsI noticed a glowing light in the sky I got my binoculars to have a look, I saw a glowing white UFO then saw 2 orbs flying around it and then they joined up together, after 15 minutes a plane flew by, the UFO flew to the northeast it then flew near the plane very fast and returned in the same spot near my house after 30 seconds, while I was trying to take some photos the UFO went in and out of the clouds, I felt it was playing with me I would wave it to come out and it did, as I tried to take a photo it would go back in the clouds,I eventually got some photos and video.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Glenroy
This sighting has never been favorited.
